title: Sony Xperia 1 IV Review: A different approach to mobile photography
content:
Sony’s smartphones have always differed from other handsets on the market, in that they never seemed to care about industry trends. This could be something as superficial as bezel sizes — Sony has never bothered to chase the all-screen look the way other Android brands have — to something as crucial as digital imaging philosophies.

The post Sony Xperia 1 IV Review: A different approach to mobile photography appeared first on XDA.
description: The Sony Xperia 1 IV takes a different approach to mobile photography, which we break down in our review. Check out what that means here.
